entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
